text: 12.48: Wkp 5.17; 1 T 1.13Khaŋ muuŋgi ŋaara guma, ana wo gari guma bakɨme ndɨkndɨgi gum vuzvugi kaŋgi fhu, ana pham bigɨn thueŋ muuŋgip, ana ne suaŋv zaa ndirga. Ana gari guma bakɨme pim ana shogɨrga fhu. Guma bigi vhɨrve ndigi, ana bigi vhɨrvera ŋgarkararga. Fhe Bakɨme maaŋ muuŋgip bigi vhɨrvera guma the farve khɨngirga, ana bigi vhɨrvera ŋgarɨga suaŋv kamɨnga.”
